name: Solvent Proficiency
base_effect: Allows use of increasingly powerful solvents for creating potions and poisons of higher levels.

rank_progression.8: Star Dew (CP100) and Night-Oil (CP100) and Lorkhan's Tears (CP150) and Alkahest (CP150)

name: Keen Eye: Reagents
base_effect: Reagents in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Medicinal Use
base_effect: Increases the duration of potions you drink.

name: Chemistry
base_effect: Produces extra potions or poisons per crafting attempt.

name: Laboratory Use
base_effect: Allows the use of up to 3 reagents while crafting potions or poisons.

rank_progression.1: Can use 3 reagents per potion or poison

name: Snakeblood
base_effect: Reduces the negative effects of potions you drink.

name: Metalworking
base_effect: Allows the use of increasingly rare and powerful ingots for crafting metal weapons and armor.

name: Keen Eye: Ore
base_effect: Ore in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Miner Hireling
base_effect: A miner hireling will send you ore and occasionally other items every day.

rank_progression.1: Hireling sends materials once per day
rank_progression.2: Hireling sends better materials once per day
rank_progression.3: Hireling sends even better materials twice per day

name: Metal Extraction
base_effect: Improves the chance of extracting ingredients and tempers when deconstructing metal items.

rank_progression.3: Maximizes extraction chance for ingots, tempers, and trait stones

name: Metallurgy
base_effect: Reduces research times and allows multiple items to be researched simultaneously.

rank_progression.1: Research 5% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.2: Research 10% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.3: Research 20% faster, can research 3 items at once
rank_progression.4: Research 25% faster, can research 3 items at once

name: Temper Expertise
base_effect: Increases the chance of improving metal items with tempers.

name: Tailoring
base_effect: Allows the use of increasingly rare and powerful materials for crafting light and medium armor.

name: Keen Eye: Cloth
base_effect: Fibrous plants in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Outfitter Hireling
base_effect: An outfitter hireling will send you cloth and leather materials and occasionally other items every day.

rank_progression.1: Hireling sends materials once per day
rank_progression.2: Hireling sends better materials once per day
rank_progression.3: Hireling sends even better materials twice per day

name: Unraveling
base_effect: Improves the chance of extracting ingredients and tannins when deconstructing cloth and leather items.

rank_progression.3: Maximizes extraction chance for materials, tannins, and trait stones

name: Stitching
base_effect: Reduces research times and allows multiple items to be researched simultaneously.

rank_progression.1: Research 5% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.2: Research 10% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.3: Research 20% faster, can research 3 items at once
rank_progression.4: Research 25% faster, can research 3 items at once

name: Tannin Expertise
base_effect: Increases the chance of improving cloth and leather items with tannins.

name: Potency Improvement
base_effect: Allows creation and use of increasingly powerful Potency Runestones for glyphs.

name: Keen Eye: Runestones
base_effect: Runestones in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Hireling
base_effect: A hireling will send you runestones and occasionally other items every day.

rank_progression.1: Hireling sends runestones once per day
rank_progression.2: Hireling sends better runestones once per day
rank_progression.3: Hireling sends even better runestones twice per day

name: Aspect Improvement
base_effect: Allows the use of higher quality Aspect Runestones for creating more powerful glyphs.

name: Runestone Extraction
base_effect: Improves the chance of extracting runestones when deconstructing glyphs.

rank_progression.3: Maximizes extraction chance for all runestone types

name: Engraver
base_effect: Allows the use of increasingly powerful materials for crafting jewelry.

name: Keen Eye: Jewelry
base_effect: Seams in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Jewelry Extraction
base_effect: Improves the chance of extracting ingredients and platings when deconstructing jewelry.

rank_progression.3: Maximizes extraction chance for ounces, platings, and grains

name: Platings Expertise
base_effect: Increases the chance of improving jewelry items with platings.

name: Lapidary Research
base_effect: Reduces research times and allows multiple jewelry items to be researched simultaneously.

rank_progression.1: Research 5% faster, can research 1 item at once
rank_progression.2: Research 10% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.3: Research 20% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.4: Research 25% faster, can research 3 items at once

name: Jewelry Hireling
base_effect: A hireling will send you jewelry crafting materials and occasionally other items every day.

rank_progression.1: Hireling sends materials once per day
rank_progression.2: Hireling sends better materials once per day
rank_progression.3: Hireling sends even better materials twice per day

name: Recipe Quality
base_effect: Allows the use of higher quality food and drink recipes.

rank_progression.4: Can use Epic (Purple) and Legendary (Gold) recipes

name: Recipe Improvement
base_effect: Allows the creation of higher level food and drink from recipes.

name: Gourmand
base_effect: Increases the duration of any food you eat.

name: Connoisseur
base_effect: Increases the duration of any drink you consume.

name: Chef
base_effect: Creates extra food per crafting attempt.

name: Brewer
base_effect: Creates extra drinks per crafting attempt.

name: Woodworking
base_effect: Allows the use of increasingly rare and powerful wood for crafting bows, staves, and shields.

name: Keen Eye: Wood
base_effect: Wood in the world will be easier to see when you are within range.

name: Lumberjack Hireling
base_effect: A lumberjack hireling will send you wood and occasionally other items every day.

rank_progression.1: Hireling sends materials once per day
rank_progression.2: Hireling sends better materials once per day
rank_progression.3: Hireling sends even better materials twice per day

name: Wood Extraction
base_effect: Improves the chance of extracting ingredients and resins when deconstructing wooden items.

rank_progression.3: Maximizes extraction chance for materials, resins, and trait stones

name: Carpentry
base_effect: Reduces research times and allows multiple items to be researched simultaneously.

rank_progression.1: Research 5% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.2: Research 10% faster, can research 2 items at once
rank_progression.3: Research 20% faster, can research 3 items at once
rank_progression.4: Research 25% faster, can research 3 items at once

name: Resin Expertise
base_effect: Increases the chance of improving wooden items with resins.
